summary:
AutoCAD  | Architect | Design & Construction | Concept Designer | Architecture | Planning | Team Leader | Interior Design

🏠 Working as a Senior Architect for residential, developing a broad portfolio. Strong performance in Design Process, AutoCAD, and basic knowledge of SketchUp, Ensuring on-time delivery of projects, defining project objectives, prioritizing activities, and training new employees.

📚 Controlling cost and maximizing productivity through the implementation of effective methods and standard processes. Strong Design Architect, with a specialization in Management of Developments in Civil Construction (Universidade Presbiteriana Mackenzie), Funiture Design (Senai), and a Bachelor of Architecture (Universidade São Francisco). 

10 Years of experience in planning, designing, detailing and coordinating with team while executing projects. Remarkable expertise in client servicing, contract negotiations, preparation of pre-design documents, cost estimating and budget preparation, tracking project performance, and monitoring the team dynamics.

🗣 Fluent in Portuguese, English, and also learning Dutch . Seeking to develop new partner relationships. Aiming to gain experience in Architectural Design and Concept Design. Developing creative/alternative approaches to problem resolution.

Hands-On Experience, focusing on the desired project result. Easy of working on teams, International Experience, Clear Precise Communicator, Comprehensive, Detail Oriented, and Leadership Skills. Ability to negotiate with clients and partners. 

🎯 Goals: Resolve complex spatial challenges, translate rough ideas into lucid sketches, ensure that each project fulfills the client's needs, and participate from concept through technical detailing.

Relevant Keywords:
► AutoCAD
► Architect & Designer
► Team Leader
* EU Passport / Right to live and work

 
Do not hesitate to contact me 
☎ + 31 6 15171271
💬 + 31 6 15171271
 ✉ juroxo@gmail.com 
📍Location: Tilburg, The Netherlands

profile_positions.description:
• Develop interior design projects for expatriates living in the
Netherlands, Belgium and Germany.
• Visit the customer to take measurements and informations of
their needs.
• Realization of online projects according to measurements and
information received from customers.
• Delivery of the final project with specification of all items and
where to buy.

AutoCAD | Design | Concept Designer | Interior Design
profile_positions.title: Interior designer

profile_positions.description:
• Developing ideas keeping in mind the client’s needs, residence’s usage. 
• Controlling projects from start to finish to ensure high quality, innovative, and functional design.
• Ensure that all works are carried out to specific standards, building codes, guidelines, and regulations.
• Using the "Briefing" to define consumer requirements, plan job reports, and product proposals.
• Produce detailed blueprints and make any necessary corrections, utilizing  AutoCAD.
• Cooperating and liaising with construction professionals.


Customer Needs | Costs, Angles, and Weights | Creativity | AutoCAD | Team Player
profile_positions.title: Senior Architect

profile_positions.location: São José do Rio Prêto, São Paulo, Brazil
profile_positions.description:
• Meet with Mafi Móveis Especiais clients to determine their requirements for the project.
• Produce comprehensive sketches, assist in the correct execution of the parts within the company's factory.
• Negotiating with contractors and other professionals throughout the established process.
• Monitor the execution and installation of all furniture.
• Making site visits to check on the progress of the assigned projects.
• Dealing with problems that might come up during the project phase, such as environment, documents, and others.

Layouts and Colour Boards | Technical Drawings | Team Oriented | Problem-Solving | Strong Design | Customer Focus
profile_positions.title: Architect

profile_positions.description:
• Design and document, with a focus on high standard apartment renovations.
• Consult with clients to determine their requirements
• Managing a project from on-site measurement, project implementation, budget control, project tracking through the completion.
• Regular visits to monitor the execution of projects, with documentation for costumers and office owners.
• Resolving complex design issues with innovative and practical solutions.
• Working with AutoCAD, to create drawings and specifications for architectural projects.
• Supervision of Junior members of the office team.

 Customer Focus | AutoCAD | Team Leader | Detail Oriented | Negotiation | People Skills l Networking
profile_positions.title: Senior Architect

profile_positions.description:
• Support designers of complementary disciplines during the development of a large residential project.
• Follow-up of renewals for compatibility of residential project. 
• Organization of project files.
• Direct contact with the executors of the projects for alignment and clarification of doubts.
• Visits to monitor projects in progress at the construction company.
• Internal team work with professionals who perform other related functions.
• Execution of details in AutoCAD.

Customer Focus | Architect l AutoCad  l Construction
profile_positions.title: Architect

profile_positions.description:
• Developing a broad portfolio, including residential and the development sector.
• Developing details of concepts created by the owners of the company, for common areas of residential buildings, as well as model apartments with AutoCAD.
• Ensure on-time delivery of projects, define project objectives, and prioritize activities.
• Participating in project filing, organization, documentation related to different phases of the project.
• Documentation of ongoing projects to monitor the office's coordination.
• Assistance in setting up the decoration of model apartments for incorporation.
• Survey of project costs for checking and adjusting the funds available for execution.


AutoCAD | Architect | Design & Construction | Concept Designer | Interior Design
profile_positions.title: Architect

profile_positions.description:
• Preparing and presenting design proposals, including detailed drawings of finished residences, renovations.
• Create detailed drawings and specifications for architectural projects. Using: AutoCAD
• Participating in project management throughout the construction. 
• Working with contractors, and
service engineers to create a construction schedule and bring the designs to fruition.
• Survey of the costs of the reform according to the project.
• Contact with customers to present budget proposals and align suppliers' contracting.

Interior Design | Customer Focus | AutoCAD | Architectural drawings | Networking
profile_positions.title: Junior Architect

profile_positions.description:
• Answering Client’s inquiries, maintaining documentation of communications, existing issues, and issue resolutions.
• Finding new strategies to connect with potential clients.
• Cold calling prospects, communicating the value that the company can bring to their business, and reaching the targets.
• Forecast sales activity and revenue achievement, while attending to customers needs.		
• Study of products for better presentation to the customer during sales.
• Direct contact with store owners for accountability.

Driven, Tenacious and Personable | Comfortable Working Towards Targets | Sales Driven | Strong Communicator | Listening Skills
profile_positions.title: Sales Representative - Furniture and Objects

profile_positions.description:
• Participating in the design and specifications of projects. Working directly with the CEO on the initial pre-concept phase.
• Prepare elevations, and design proposals.
• Developing creation processes, presentations, meetings, and even project approvals in condominiums and city hall.
• Prepare drawings, editing, and adjusting these plans multiple times until the client is satisfied.
• Present ideas, and plans. Being a confident speaker and knowing how to best illustrate the project to the clients.
• Cooperating with the company owner, to read and understand better blueprints. 

Layouts | Time Management | Creativity | AutoCAD
profile_positions.title: Architectural Internship

profile_positions.description:
• Verifying if specified materials are being used, dimensions are as drawn and quality is according to the contract document.
• Ensure that all works are carried out to specific standards. 
• Working closely with the team to communicate project needs and timeliness.
• Assisting with all phases of design.
• Direct contact with the work coordination team.
• Follow the daily routine of the work and learn basic notions about construction.


Communication Skills | Ability to Work in Teams | Architecture | Construction
profile_positions.title: Construction Intern

company.name: Group of young people from Itatiba, SP

volunteer_experiences.description:
•	A group of young people gathered to collect money.
•	Also collect new toys.
•	Buy toys in stores with the money raised.
•	Pack all toys with wrapping paper.
•	Distribute toys to poor children in the city of Itatiba, SP.
•	The delivery date was October 12th, also known in Brazil as Children's Day. A day that children are usually given as gifts. However, some families cannot afford to buy and some received donated gifts.
